title: Caffè Shakerato (Italian-Style Shaken Iced Coffee) Recipe

Directions
Add ice and sugar to a cocktail shaker. Pour hot espresso on top, seal shaker, and shake vigorously until thoroughly chilled, 10 to 20 seconds.
Strain iced espresso into a cocktail glass, coupe, or other glass vessel and serve right away.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker
,
cocktail strainer
Notes
If you can't make an espresso shot at home, you can use other forms of concentrated coffee, such as from a
moka pot
or Aeropress.
Make-Ahead and Storage
The caffè shakerato is best enjoyed right away.
